item.title: What is TOCTOU
item.description: TOCTOU mean Time-of-Check to Time-of-Use. It’s a bug were it involve checking the state of the system and using the result Example if (access("file", W_OK) != 0) { exit(1); } fd = open("file", O_WRONLY); write(fd, buffer, sizeof(buffer)); Here an attacker can create a symlink after the access but before the open call, resulting in a malicious file to be open. Synonyms TOCTTOU TOC/TOU Source wikipedia
